# User object field definitions

* userID
  *  64-Bit Integer
  *  Generated by the server
    

* username
  * String
  * Chosen by the user
  * Not unique
  * Must not be null  
  

* password
  *  String
  *  used internally
  * **Should never be in the Json response, if it is, open an issue** 
 

* createDate
  * 64-Bit Integer
  * Unix timestamp
  * Generated by the Server


* lastLogin
  * 64-Bit Integer
  * Unix timestamp
  * Generated by the Server
  

* emailAddress
  * String
  * unique
